      • charge

        public Transaction charge(java.lang.String token,
                          Amount amount)
                   throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException,
                          javax.crypto.BadPaddingException,
                          javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException,
                          KushkiException
        Perform a charge in Kushki using a valid token for the given amount.
        Parameters:
        token - A token obtained from the frontend or using the requestToken(com.kushkipagos.Card, java.lang.Double) method.
        amount - The detailed Amount to be charged.
        Returns:
        A Transaction which contains the result of the operation.
        Throws:
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
        javax.crypto.BadPaddingException
        javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException
        KushkiException
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • deferredCharge

        public Transaction deferredCharge(java.lang.String token,
                                  Amount amount,
                                  java.lang.Integer months)
                           throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException,
                                  javax.crypto.BadPaddingException,
                                  javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException,
                                  KushkiException
        Perform a deferred charge in Kushki using a valid token for the given amount.
        Parameters:
        token - A token obtained from the frontend or using the requestToken(com.kushkipagos.Card, java.lang.Double) method.
        amount - The detailed Amount to be charged.
        months - The number of months to defer the payment.
        Returns:
        A Transaction which contains the result of the operation.
        Throws:
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
        javax.crypto.BadPaddingException
        javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException
        KushkiException
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • voidCharge

        public Transaction voidCharge(java.lang.String ticket,
                              Amount amount)
                       throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException,
                              javax.crypto.BadPaddingException,
                              javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException,
                              KushkiException
        Void a transaction previously performed in Kushki.
        Parameters:
        ticket - The ticket number of the transaction to be voided.
        amount - The detailed Amount to be voided.
        Returns:
        A Transaction which contains the result of the operation.
        Throws:
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
        javax.crypto.BadPaddingException
        javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException
        KushkiException
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • requestToken

        public Transaction requestToken(Card card,
                                java.lang.Double totalAmount)
                         throws javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException,
                                KushkiException,
                                javax.crypto.BadPaddingException,
                                com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
        Request a token to later perform charge operations in Kushki using the charge(java.lang.String, com.kushkipagos.Amount) or deferredCharge(java.lang.String, com.kushkipagos.Amount, java.lang.Integer) methods. This must be done from a Kushki instance built with the public merchant ID, not the private one.
        Note: If you are using this method from your backend, be sure to comply with all the PCI requirements to handle card data on your servers.
        Parameters:
        card - The Card to which the token will be associated.
        totalAmount - The total amount which will be authorized.
        Returns:
        A Transaction from which, if successful, the token can be extracted with the Transaction.getToken() method.
        Throws:
        javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException
        KushkiException
        javax.crypto.BadPaddingException
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
        Since:
        1.1.0
